mapper.insert: insert into t_acct_item (account_book_type, itemcode, itemname, itembalby, itemclass, itemnotes, itemlevel, itemfather, currtype, mainacct, cqacct) values (#{accountBookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itembalby,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{itemclass,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{itemnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemlevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{itemfather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mainacct,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cqacct,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update t_acct_item set itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itembalby = #{itembalby,jdbcType=TINYINT}, itemclass = #{itemclass,jdbcType=TINYINT}, itemnotes = #{itemnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemlevel = #{itemlevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, itemfather = #{itemfather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currtype = #{currtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, mainacct = #{mainacct,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cqacct = #{cqacct,jdbcType=TINYINT} where account_book_type = #{accountBookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and itemcode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select account_book_type, itemcode, itemname, itembalby, itemclass, itemnotes, itemlevel, itemfather, currtype, mainacct, cqacct from t_acct_item
